Authors:
yuyan Xu, Ning Mao, Si-Peng Jian, Zhu-Liang Yang, Li
Fan
Title:
Gomphocantharellus, a new genus based on Gomphocantharellus
cylindrosporus in Gomphales (Basidiomycota)
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, Cantharelloid fungi, Multigene phylogeny,
Taxonomy
Abstract:
A new genus Gomphocantharellus and species
Gomphocantharellus cylindrosporus are proposed based on morphological
characteristics and molecular phylogenetic evidences inferred from
nucleotide sequences of ITS, 28S nuc rDNA, mtSSU and ATP6.
Gomphocantharellus cylindrosporus looks like a species of the genus
Cantharellus, but differs from the latter by its cylindrical
basidiospores. Phylogenetic analysis showed this mushroom species formed
an independent monophyletic lineage within Gomphales.
